*Clicker Training Progress

1. Issued a password to the dog, such as lay down, play dead, pick Frisbee, jump through hoops, etc.

2. Waiting for Dog to make right moves

3. Click

4. Treat dog, such as food

Note:

You must “Treat dog, such as food”

And be patient, it may take some time

Clicker Training is such a win-win way of training, not so much training methods, as it is a game, people play with dogs.

* About the product

√ A brand new happy communication mode with the pet.

√ Not only train the dog but also the cat, bird, chicken, sheep and even mouse. Must-have training tool for sound-sensitive pets.

√ The clicker training can train the dog house-trained, basic obedience, small trick, and correct the bad behavior.

√ Button for easy clicking and loud sound.

√ By pressing the yellow button the clicker makes a distinct and recognizable sound designed to get your dogs attention and become a familiar indicator of a job well done

√ These training clickers are contoured to fit your hand and each comes with a wristband for your convenience

*Package Include

2 different colors: Blue, Black, each color 1 PCS


▼Come in 2 pack button clickers with wrist strap in 2 different colors: Blue, Black
▼Can be used to train the dog basic obedience, small trick, and correct the bad behavior; Scientific method of training your pet safely and easily.
▼Stop barking and dog obdeience. Train your dog quiqly just by simply pressing the clicker and command.
Well constructed and durable, metal clicker will not rust or break.
Big button for easy clicking and loud sound. Easy to use in any position.

Protects Your Wrists : With raised ergonomic soft memory form design, it will provide good touch and effective support to your wrist. Keep arms, wrists, and hands from getting sore while using the computer, maximum reduce wrist stress and tiredness.

Price: $8.99 - $6.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:51:15 UTC – Details)

item.title: North Edge Apache Men’s Sports Watches for Outdoor Tactical Survival Adventure Hiking，EL Backlight，5ATM waterproof，with Military Army Altimeter Barometer，Pedometer，Pacer，Digital Wrist Watch，Large Dial
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) My team members are very passionate about outdoor sports, we often go fishing, mountain climbing, hiking, biking, outdoor tactical survival adventures, etc. together. However, nothing is 100% predictable, on the way, we encountered many contingencies such as broken compass in the jungle, sudden drop in temperature, non-waterproof watches not working, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $79.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 05:08:58 UTC – Details)


My team members are very passionate about outdoor sports, we often go fishing, mountain climbing, hiking, biking, outdoor tactical survival adventures, etc. together. However, nothing is 100% predictable, on the way, we encountered many contingencies such as broken compass in the jungle, sudden drop in temperature, non-waterproof watches not working, inability to measure distance traveled and forgetting to bring Altimeter and Barometer etc. We all love watches, so our designer Jake designed this multifunctional outdoor sports watch with a large dial and large numbers.It’s a cool great companion.
We calibrated the compass before sending. We have carefully prepared a graphical version of the manual for you to make it easier for you to use the functions of the watch.
Function :
1. Altimeter (altitude trend chart and climb rate)      
2. Barometer ( air pressure trend chart)
3. Compass             4. Thermometer         5. Weather Forecast  
6. Pedometer, step counter, calorie, distance record
7. Time functions: hour, minute, second, year(2000-2099), month, date, weekday,
8. Alarm clock (2 sets alarm clock, )       
9. Countdown timer (99:59:59~0)       10. Stopwatch (0~:59:59),
11. Worldtime functions (daylight saving time switch automatically)
12. Corporates digital compass, altimeter, barometer, Thermometer, air pressure trend and altitude trend and altitude trend
13. Button tone on or off
14. Battery life remind
15. EL Backlight
Case Thickness# 14mm       Water Resistance Depth #50m
Style#Sport Item                   Type# Digital Wrist watches
Dial Diameter#50mm           Band Material Type#nylon strap
Band Length #25cm              Band color#Black、Blue、Green                
(In-kind shooting, we try to restore the true color, but due to different lighting conditions and viewing angle of the display device, everyone’s feeling of color may be different, please refer to the actual object received)
Package Include: Watch X1, manual X1,  a black square gift box. 
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.09 x 4.02 x 2.99 inches; 8.78 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ Apache
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 CR2032 batteries required. (included)
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 1, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ North Edge-Apache
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09X14KH3T
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Material & Size: Dial Window #Tempered Glass, Watch Case #Stainless Steel, Watch Band #Nylon Band, Japanese battery #CR2032 18 months life. Case Size: Diameter #50.0mm/1.96”,Thickness #16mm/0.63”. Weight #117g/0.258lbs.
Usage: Suitable For indoor/outdoor sports or daily use freely, tactical training, running, hiking, swimming, fishing, climbing, cycling, Tactical Survival adventure etc.
Note: The Military tactical Watch has a big watch face with large numbers, watch weigh may feel heavier. Please Keep away from hot water and water vapor. Best to automatically or manually calibrate the various functions of the watch before use.
Great technology, Great looking watch with great features, Beautiful designer, Nice size. Package Include: Watch X1, manual X1, a black square gift box. Please contact us if you have any questions.
Band.Length: 260.0 Millimeters
Clasp type: Push Button Deployment Clasp
Item shape: Round

(as of Nov 29,2022 04:45:59 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Remember those slap bracelets from middle school? Like you, they’re all grown up now, with grownup responsibilities like keeping all your nuts, bolts, and screws handy while you clear that weekend chore list.
SUPER STRONG – Fifteen powerful magnets in the band with breathable mesh inside to hold everything you need to help put the Handy in Handyman. Chores around the house are a lot more fun with a tool belt on your wrist!
MULTIPURPOSE – Whether Grandpa is a woodworking wizard or the world’s greatest hair stylist, the MagSnap makes a great birthday or Fathers Day present. Trust us, he’ll feel super cool holding nails and sewing pins on his new magnetic bracelet.
GREAT GIFT – Whether it’s a stocking stuffer or just looking to give a cool gadget gift. This is the perfect gift to give a husband, dad, father-in-law, DIYer, handyman, electrician, mechanic, or just that person who has everything.
INCLUDES – (1) MagSnap magnetic wrist band. One size fits most. Great gift for dads who have everything. Wrap-It Storage is a family business based in St. Paul, MN. PATENT PENDING.
